name: PaperJump
description:
PaperJump is an endless runner, platformer game. Help Dotty the Stray Pencil Mark get dodge the rolling pencils coming towards her. Use your mouse to make her jump, the more pencils you dodge, the higher your score will get. 

As an assignment for my high school game design class, I decided to create an independent game studio and publish my games under JJPGames. I'm still in high school however and this is my first game, please be nice :-D.
